name: Standard Fighter
description: Stock close combat fighter. Cheap and effective in taking out other Fighters and poorly armored Frigates.

name: Interceptor
description: Fast Interceptor, specifically designed to hunt down and obliterate other Fighters. Low Armor penetration capabilities lower its effectiveness in all other fields.

name: Heavy Fighter
description: Modified fighter with a strong weapon layout. Mainly useful as anti-Frigate solution.

name: Hunter
description: Missile Loadout for the Heavy fighter. Decent allround stats make this type of fighter a viable solution for most fights.

name: Bomber
description: The stock fleet bomber. The 'Nutracker' plasma bomb is a decent option against all heavily armored targets.

name: Lancer
description: A less-specialized, more-allrounder variant of the standard bomber. The particle lance has extreme armor piercing capabilities while still providing reasonable tracking, though it lacks in damage.

name: Assault Frigate
description: Fast and precise loadout for the frigate hull. Ideal for surgical strikes against poorly defended fleets or as anti fighter screen.

name: Defender
description: Stock escort ship. Suited ideally for defense against swarms of smaller ships.
